apiKeys.cannotAddToExpired: You cannot add domains to an expired key.

error.addApiKey: An error occured while generating the api key.
error.addDomain: An error occured while adding the domain.
error.deleteApiKey: An error occured while deleting the api key.
error.deleteDomain: An error occured while deleting the domain.
error.updateApiKey: An error occured while updating the api key.

addDomain.domainNameError: Domain name is invalid. Please enter something like 'domain.com'.
addDomain.enterDomain: Enter the domain name (ex: domain.com) you want to add to this api key.
addDomain.note: Please note that by default "localhost" is already working and that the "www" version of your domain will also work.
addDomain.title: Add domain to api key

common.associatedWillStopWorking: All associated editors will refuse to clean pasted data immediately.

deleteDomain.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete this domain ?

updateApiKey.pleaseSelect: Please select a new expiration date for the api key.
updateApiKey.title: Update api key's expiration date

apiKeys.pleaseAddDomain: Please add a domain to activate the api key.
apiKeys.title: Api keys
apiKeys.youHaveReached: You have reached the maximum api keys. If you want to create a new one, please delete one of your current api keys before doing so.
